title: Jacob Goldstein: The Future Of Bitcoin [ML B-Side]
description: Will BitCoin and the other cryptocurrencies be able to replace money as we know it today? will governments embrace a future where they have no control over their currencies? Jacob Goldstein (Planet Money, What's Your Problem) talks to Nate Nelson about what the future holds for BitCoin.
content:encoded: Will Bitcoin and the other cryptocurrencies be able to replace money as we know it today? Will governments embrace a future where they have no control over their currencies? Jacob Goldstein (Planet Money, What’s Your Problem) talks to Nate Nelson about what the future holds for Bitcoin.
